info.description: A temporal database with pure entity-based architecture
info.title: EntityDB API

get.description: Retrieve an entity as it existed at a specific point in time
Retrieve entities that have changed since a given timestamp

parameters.description: Timestamp in RFC3339 format (default: 1 hour ago)
parameters.name: since

post.description: Create a new entity with tags and content

get.description: Compare an entity at two different points in time
Retrieve a single entity by its ID
Retrieve the history of an entity within a time range

parameters.description: Start timestamp in RFC3339 format (default: 24 hours ago)
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: End timestamp in RFC3339 format (default: now)
parameters.name: to

get.description: List all entities or filter by various criteria
Query entities with advanced sorting, filtering, and pagination

parameters.description: Filter operator (eq, ne, gt, lt, gte, lte, like, in)
parameters.name: operator

put.description: Update an existing entity's tags and content

parameters.description: Entity ID (can also be in body)
parameters.name: id

get.description: Get a specific relationship between two entities

post.description: Create a new relationship between two entities

delete.description: Delete an existing relationship between two entities

get.description: List all relationships where the specified entity is the source
List all relationships where the specified entity is the target
List all relationships of a specific type
Get comprehensive system metrics specific to EntityDB

post.description: Create a new user entity with authentication credentials
Reset a user's password (requires admin permission)
Authenticate user and receive session token

get.description: Check authentication status and session validity
Get system health status and basic metrics
Get system metrics in Prometheus format

content.description: Can be string, map, or byte array (base64 encoded)

created_at.description: Timestamps for compatibility (we'll store these in tags)
